name: albitr
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wa(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wal(s0, wb(w1, w2))), wal(s0, wb(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: alanimi(s0, wb(w0, w1), wb(w1, w2), wb(w0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wal(s0, wb(w1, w2))), wal(s0, wb(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w1, w2)), wb(w0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wal(s0, wb(w1, w2))), wal(s0, wb(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w1, w2)), wb(w0, w2))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w1, w2)), wb(w0, w2))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wal(s0, wb(w1, w2))), wal(s0, wb(w0, w2)))

comment: Theorem *10.301 in [WhiteheadRussell] p. 151. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 24-May-2011.)
